short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open Mantis links in a new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TabMantis+ offers a quality of life improvement for Mantis Bug Tracker users. Automatically open links from specific fields in new tabs, preventing disruptions to your current page. Designed for those who desire a smoother, more efficient bug tracking experience. Enhance your workflow with TabMantis+.
